en.title: FusionExcel's Achievers Recognition Dinner MAEPS 04th July 2009 (1)
en.content:
FE's recent Achievers Recognition Dinner at MAEPS, Serdang, Malaysia on the 04th July 2009 was a GREAT SUCCESS with 1,800 Leaders, Members, VIPs and Invited Guests attending, many from overseas. The theme for the event was Country and Western with many FE members dressed up in their cowboy and cowgirl gear. Music and entertainment was provided by the 5 piece Country and Western Band, the Os Pombos. It was a fun night with great food, entertainment and fellowship among the Leaders and Members!

Highlights Of The Event Are:

- Opening Procession to the stage led by FE's Founder CEO, Paul Ting, Founder Director, KS Lee, around 
  100 Presidential Directors, Country Licensees, Spokesmen and Spokeswomen and VIPs.

- Official Launch of FE's magazine "Presidential Times" on the stage.

- Opening Speech by Founder Director, KS Lee.

- Quantum Pendant demonstrations by Presidential Director KC Phoon who as usual did a great job
  demonstrating the powers of FE's QP. First timers are usually convinced after seeing the demonstrations.

- Charity Mock Cheque Presentation to Persatuan Kanak Kanak Istimewa Kajang (Special Needs Children, 
  Kajang) of RM 10,000 and to A Piece Of Hope Charity of RM 11,000 worth of FE products. 

- FE Awards to Top 3 Country/State Licensees: Don Chan - Thailand, Lee Mei Mei - Shenyang, China and 
  Jeremy Looi - Philippines. Congratulations!

- FE Awards to Top 3 Stockiest Centers: Jankij Kaewroonkim and Thappanee Sukkasem, Lee Mei Mei and 
  Jeremy Looi. Congratulations!

- FE Awards to Top 3 Earners: KC Phoon, Rachel Thomas and James Ng. Congratulations!

- Installation of New FE Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors. Congratulations!

- Speeches by New Presidential Directors. It is always inspirational to hear their success stories! 

- Speeches by some of FE's top Presidential Directors, KC Phoon, Rachel Thomas, Dr Mohd Fadil Samion, 
  Pastor Art Medina from Philippines and Jankij from Thailand, on how they made it to the top! Truly 
  inspirational and powerful stuff!

- Award for Best Dressed Cowboy and Cowgirl for the night.

- Lucky Draws. Congratulations to the 100 Winners of FE's Quantum Watches, worth RM 1,888 per pair 
  each! Nobody does it like FE! AHOO!!

A BIG THANK YOU to MC Lovee Lee for a great job done and to all FE Staff and FE Leaders and Members for making the event a SUCCESSFUL and MEMORABLE one!

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!! 



< Click Here For More Photos >

The theme for the event was Country and Western with many FE members dressed up in their cowboy and cowgirl gear. Music and entertainment was provided by the 5 piece Country and Western Band, the Os Pombos. It was a fun night with great food, entertainment and fellowship among the Leaders and Members !
meta.author: klhunter
